job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for an MLOps Engineer to help streamline our ML development process and accelerate our research teams. You will be working as part of the newly created ML Platform Team, supporting 7+ teams that work "full stack". Our Research Engineers run Ops, Engineering and Science. We have built our own workflow engine. Now we want to streamline the process, adopt the right tools and super-charge the work we are doing., In this position, you will provide support to our R&D Researchers in all aspects of the MLOps lifecycle. You will also help us establish general coding standards when it comes to ML and MLOps. We want you to:
     * Assist R&D Researchers with fixing issues with their current setups (this includes troubleshooting, integrating CI/CD etc.).
     * Help define our "1 click process" to create custom services and data-pipelines.
     * Implement new tooling in the areas of orchestration, experiment tracking, service deployment, Infrastructure as Code.
     * Conduct research & implement ways to improve standardisation of environments across R&D Teams.
     * Create / Improve infrastructure for Github Actions.
     * Improve Template capabilities - you will be in charge of our basic ML repository.
job_details.full_text:
MLOps Engineer

We are looking for an MLOps Engineer to help streamline our ML development process and accelerate our research teams. You will be working as part of the newly created ML Platform Team, supporting 7+ teams that work "full stack". Our Research Engineers run Ops, Engineering and Science. We have built our own workflow engine. Now we want to streamline the process, adopt the right tools and super-charge the work we are doing., In this position, you will provide support to our R&D Researchers in all aspects of the MLOps lifecycle. You will also help us establish general coding standards when it comes to ML and MLOps. We want you to:
     * Assist R&D Researchers with fixing issues with their current setups (this includes troubleshooting, integrating CI/CD etc.).
     * Help define our "1 click process" to create custom services and data-pipelines.
     * Implement new tooling in the areas of orchestration, experiment tracking, service deployment, Infrastructure as Code.
     * Conduct research & implement ways to improve standardisation of environments across R&D Teams.
     * Create / Improve infrastructure for Github Actions.
     * Improve Template capabilities - you will be in charge of our basic ML repository.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes MLOps lifecycle support, streamlining ML development processes, and implementing tooling for orchestration, experiment tracking, and deployment. While it mentions supporting research teams, the core focus is on the operational and engineering aspects of machine learning systems, aligning with the ML Engineer profile.

phrases: support to our R&D Researchers in all aspects of the MLOps lifecycle
establish general coding standards when it comes to ML and MLOps
fixing issues with their current setups (this includes troubleshooting, integrating CI/CD etc.)
Help define our "1 click process" to create custom services and data-pipelines
Implement new tooling in the areas of orchestration, experiment tracking, service deployment, Infrastructure as Code
improve standardisation of environments across R&D Teams
Create / Improve infrastructure for Github Actions
Improve Template capabilities - you will be in charge of our basic ML repository
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the operational aspects of machine learning, including deployment, monitoring, CI/CD integration, infrastructure management, and standardizing ML environments, which are core to MLOps.
The mention of creating custom data pipelines falls under the umbrella of data engineering, as it involves building and maintaining the infrastructure for data flow.

While not building user-facing applications, tasks like integrating CI/CD, managing infrastructure as code, and working with CI/CD platforms like Github Actions involve software development principles for operational systems.

phrases: Our Research Engineers run Ops, Engineering and Science
Now we want to streamline the process, adopt the right tools and super-charge the work we are doing
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of the business need to accelerate research, support multiple teams, and improve overall productivity through better tooling and processes.

skills: fixing issues with their current setups
super-charge the work we are doing
Improve Template capabilities - you will be in charge of our basic ML repository
Conduct research & implement ways to improve standardisation
